attributes.action: reduce the drink drive limit to zero alcohol a total ban on drinking and driving.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: the aim of the petition is to reduce the amount of alcohol you are allowed to consume and legally drive to a intake of no alcohol whatsoever making a zero alcohol policy when it comes to driving therefore not encouraging people to associate drinking alcohol with driving a vehicle and preventing accidents that could be avoided and setting a moral standard it has been proven that drivers within the legal limit can be affected in there driving ability depending on the individual and other factors.the uk should fall in to line and set the standard as other eu countries have.
